XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for equipment checkout plugin

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_partnership_liaison
TABLE.COMMENT: Join table for partnerships and liaisons (users)

FIELD.NAME: phone
FIELD.COMMENT: The mobile phone that the user entered when filling out this form.

FIELD.NAME: phone_verified
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not phone is confirmed. 1 = Confirmed; 0 = Not confirmed

FIELD.NAME: dateofbirth
FIELD.COMMENT: User's date of birth as timestamp

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was last modified

FIELD.NAME: pickupid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the selected pickup time

FIELD.NAME: confirmationid
FIELD.COMMENT: A confirmation id, which should just be a hash of this table's 'id' field. This is intended for easy and secure lookups.

FIELD.NAME: confirmationexpired
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the selected pickup time. 0 = no, 1 = yes

FIELD.NAME: email
FIELD.COMMENT: The email that the user entered when filling out the form.

FIELD.NAME: email_confirmed
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not email is confirmed. 1 = Confirmed; 0 = Not confirmed

FIELD.NAME: firstname
FIELD.COMMENT: The first name that the user entered when filling out this form.

FIELD.NAME: lastname
FIELD.COMMENT: The last name that the user entered when filling out this form.

FIELD.NAME: phone
FIELD.COMMENT: The mobile phone that the user entered when filling out this form.

FIELD.NAME: phone_confirmed
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not phone is confirmed. 1 = Confirmed; 0 = Not confirmed

FIELD.NAME: partnership_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The partnership the user selected when filling out this form.

FIELD.NAME: pickup_locationtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The partnership's pickup location and time that the user selected when filling out this form.

FIELD.NAME: electronicsignature
FIELD.COMMENT: The full name that the user typed when filling out this form. First and last name should match the 'firstname' and 'lastname' field entries in the same row, if everything went correctly.

FIELD.NAME: pickuppersonname
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the person picking up the equipment (if different from user)

FIELD.NAME: pickuppersonphone
FIELD.COMMENT: Phone number of the person picking up

FIELD.NAME: pickuppersondetails
FIELD.COMMENT: Details about the person picking up the students equipment

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was last modified

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_vccsubmission_agreement
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores agreements shown in virtual course consent (vcc) submissions

FIELD.NAME: vccsubmissionid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the related virtual course consent (vcc) submission

FIELD.NAME: optinout
FIELD.COMMENT: Response for opt-in/opt-out agreements. 1 = opt-in, 2 = opt-out, 0 = nothing selected (which shouldn't ever happen)

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_vccsubmission_student
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores student information for virtual course consent (vcc)

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Not using this yet, but it will be the ID of the student user

FIELD.NAME: vccsubmissionid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the related virtual course consent (vcc) submission that the parent filled out

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was created

FIELD.NAME: phoneisverified
FIELD.COMMENT: OTP verification status, 0 for not verified, 1 for verified

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_user_exchange
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for storing the reminder code for whether or not the user has been sent a reminder text or email about equipment for a given course: no record = user has not been sent a reminder and should NOT be sent one, 0 = user marked for sending a reminder but has not been sent one yet, 1 = only first remainder has been sent to user (days before exchange), 2 = only second reminder has been sent to user (minutes before exchange), 9 = user has been sent all reminders and should no longer be sent any reminders for that particular exchange time. 9 should be the most common entry in the table.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user submitting the exchange form

FIELD.NAME: exchangeid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the selected exchange time

FIELD.NAME: pickup_person_name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the person picking up the equipment (if different from user)

FIELD.NAME: pickup_person_phone
FIELD.COMMENT: Phone number of the person picking up

FIELD.NAME: pickup_person_details
FIELD.COMMENT: Details about the person picking up the equipment

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was last modified

FIELD.NAME: upc
FIELD.COMMENT: Universal Product Code for barcode integration

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_items
TABLE.COMMENT: Individual equipment items with UUID tracking

FIELD.NAME: uuid
FIELD.COMMENT: Current UUID for QR code tracking

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: available, checked_out, in_transit, maintenance, damaged, lost, removed

FIELD.NAME: current_userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Current user who has the item (if checked out)

FIELD.NAME: student_label
FIELD.COMMENT: Student name label applied to item

FIELD.NAME: removal_reason
FIELD.COMMENT: Reason for removal (damaged, lost, disposed, end-of-life, stolen, returned-to-vendor)

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_uuid_history
TABLE.COMMENT: History of all UUIDs associated with equipment items

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_configurations
TABLE.COMMENT: Equipment configurations for different course arrangements

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of equipment in this configuration

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_transactions
TABLE.COMMENT: Log of all equipment check-in/check-out transactions

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_allocations
TABLE.COMMENT: Equipment allocated to students based on course enrollment

TABLE.NAME: local_equipment_qr_print_queue
TABLE.COMMENT: QR code printing queue for equipment items

FIELD.NAME: notes
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional notes about the queue item
